column5: Uh oh a good time to quit smoking  Of course your not 40 yet  Have a good time boys!
I'll take that as a compliment bud, I'm waaay past 40  .  (Unless of course you're referring to Cliff who is indeed still a young pup, but looks much, much older. Older than me anyway  )
I am sure that you will have a great time just have one little request for you....  Can you make sure that I get him back alive and in one piece??
I've got the liability waiver right here in front of me for Cliff to sign  .
Have a great trip guys, can't wait for the report.  Safe travels.

OOPS ya was referring to almost 40 Cliff.You have been doing the portage thing for some time.  I don't portaging my 16 ft fiberglass canoe its 40 inches wide and weighs about 85 lbs.I didn't know you smoked Mike.
Then it will most likely not rain. Perfect. Have fun guys. Looking forward to the report.
Ok...just finished marking gps coordinates on the map so we don't miss any turns....LOL.  Almost done on my end....just waiting for Solopaddler to arrive!
Leaving in 15 minutes buddy!
Thanks everyone.  This will be a learning experience for me for sure!  Can't think of a better guide.  MTP - I'm not 40 yet...but sometimes I sure feel it...LOL.  Mike - see you soon then!
Are you still here  . Almost 9 hrs from the first post to last. I have to tell you that you guys are even slower then my wife O.K. be back in a min......  Good luck guys, take a lot of pictures
Wait till you've hauled that canoe for a few kliks, not to mention all the beer.  JF
Have a great and safe time!

I remember Spiel posted last month about how time consuming packing and preparing for a major trip was. Man is he right!  Anyhoo I'm locked and loaded and ready to roll. Leaving straight from the office tonight at 9pm. Yeah baby      What'ya think Cliffster, did I bring enough stuff?
Good luck and be safe
Ya but nothings worse then getting there and going "DOH!!!...forgot my Camera, or where is my Rod???" LOL!  Have fun!

Looks like enough stuff...just one question...where is MY stuff supposed to go??? LOL.  My camera and camcorder are charging as we speak.  Just some last minute packing and I'm all set, awaiting you call when you are almost at my place.  Should be a blast!
Where's the beer?  Can't wait to here the stories from this trip guys, have fun!
best of luck on your trip, i've been doing the same thing, leaving wed. evening.  jason
So... tell me where you're going in case I need to call in the loco search and rescue squad...???

Thanks for well wishes guys.  Cliff, don't worry we'll fit everything in. BTW, we'll be portaging so prepare yourself.  Jason, good luck on your trip as well man!  Bunk, we'll be roughly 160km N/E of Cochrane. Is that precise enough?  .
Actually, YES!!!  I'm guessing the road and many of those lakes right now.  You and Cliff have a great time.  Leave me the link to this one in a pm if you're not back by next tuesday.
We're back on Sunday night.. Check your pm's no need to guess where we're going  .
Enjoy the trip, bud...and very much looking forward to the report!  Good Fishing,  Justin
Uh-oh!... sounds like this one is gonna hurt  Y'all have fun now ya heah?!!!
I'll be at a small lake off that same road this time next week.  I won't be doing a big  "Detour"
Have a great and safe trip.  Looking forward to the report.
Have a good time Solo, may the force be with you, lol.
You might as well just leave now for all the work yer gonna get done in the next few hours.  JF
Have a Safe trip guys and make sure you take lots of pics for the report.  Mike

I'm ALL for that idea, can't do it though. I work at the weather office in Hamilton and we can't leave our stations unmanned LOL! Besides which I've got some major weather occurring here this evening which is keeping me unusually busy. (figures  )  Thanks again everyone, it's gonna be a fun one!
Could you set the controls for some decent weather before you go?  Have fun Dan
Have a great time!  Can't wait to read the report!
good luck and have fun guys
There's a thought. Mebbe he's like some kinda bad weather magnet. We'll see how it goes while he's away. If he and Cliff get rained out and we get sun - I say we petition for him to be fired.  JF
cant wait for the post.anxious to see how u make out.
Sounds like fun. Weedbeds should be well established. I'd be taking a temp gage.
I think I'm in trouble. They're calling for rain every single day up there  .
